newsitem.title: USA: Coltec agrees to buy AMI Industries Inc.
newsitem.headline: Coltec agrees to buy AMI Industries Inc.

text.p: Coltec Industries Inc said Monday it has signed an agreement in principle to acquire AMI Industries Inc, manufacturer of flight attendant and cockpit seats for commercial aircraft.
Terms of the transaction were not disclosed, but the company said that subject to normal closing conditions, the sale is scheduled to close during the second quarter of 1997.
AMI Industries, said the company, expects to have 1997 revenues approaching $30 million.
Coltec Industries is a diversified manufacturing company serving primarily aerospace and general industrial markets.
